verses.name: Jeremiah 31:17
verses.text: And there is hope in thine end, saith the Lord, that thy children shall come again to their own border.

verses.name: Jeremiah 31:18
verses.text: I have surely heard Ephraim bemoaning himself thus; Thou hast chastised me, and I was chastised, as a bullock unaccustomed to the yoke: turn thou me, and I shall be turned; for thou art the Lord my God.

verses.name: Jeremiah 31:19
verses.text: Surely after that I was turned, I repented; and after that I was instructed, I smote upon my thigh: I was ashamed, yea, even confounded, because I did bear the reproach of my youth.
